original_title: Six arrested in Dematagoda while abducting man and woman
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Six suspects who were abducting a woman and a man have been arrested in Dematagoda.

The Police say that the special task force also seized the three-wheeler and the motorcycle that the suspects used when abducting the said individuals, during a raid near the Veluvanaramaya in Dematagoda.
The suspects are between the ages 22 and 28, and residents of Colombo 09 and 10.
The female abducted is a resident of the Etempolawatte Road in Hendala, Wattala, and the male is a resident of Makola south.
